description:
A huge two-handed broadsword made of dragon scales. It may look dull, but its blade can easily pierce through dragons.

Rune Slot: rune (<color_red>strength</color>)
<color_cyan>Runic Strength</color>:
<color_white>Grants 1 strength and increases physical damage by 10% and resistance by 1. Physical resistance is limited to covered body part(s). Former doesn't stack.</color>

Abilities:
<color_cyan>Dragon's Bane</color>:
<color_white>Attacking rolls a 1/3 chance. If successful, this weapon deals 45-60 cutting damage to dragon-type monsters.</color>

A huge two-handed broadsword made of dragon scales. It may look dull, but its blade can easily pierce through dragons.

Rune Slot: rune (<color_light_green>dexterity</color>)
<color_cyan>Runic Dexterity</color>:
<color_white>Grants 1 dexterity and increases movement and attack speed by 3. Stackable.</color>

Abilities:
<color_cyan>Dragon's Bane</color>:
<color_white>Attacking rolls a 1/3 chance. If successful, this weapon deals 45-60 cutting damage to dragon-type monsters.</color>

A huge two-handed broadsword made of dragon scales. It may look dull, but its blade can easily pierce through dragons.

Rune Slot: rune (<color_light_blue>intelligence</color>)
<color_cyan>Runic Intelligence</color>:
<color_white>Grants 1 intelligence and increases mana capacity by 250. Stackable.</color>

Abilities:
<color_cyan>Dragon's Bane</color>:
<color_white>Attacking rolls a 1/3 chance. If successful, this weapon deals 45-60 cutting damage to dragon-type monsters.</color>

A huge two-handed broadsword made of dragon scales. It may look dull, but its blade can easily pierce through dragons.

Rune Slot: rune (<color_yellow>perception</color>)
<color_cyan>Runic Perception</color>:
<color_white>Grants 1 perception and increases accuracy of attacks by 20%. Latter doesn't stack.</color>

Abilities:
<color_cyan>Dragon's Bane</color>:
<color_white>Attacking rolls a 1/3 chance. If successful, this weapon deals 45-60 cutting damage to dragon-type monsters.</color>

A huge two-handed broadsword made of dragon scales. It may look dull, but its blade can easily pierce through dragons.

Rune Slot: elemental rune (<color_light_red>fire</color>)
<color_cyan>Runic Blaze</color>:
<color_white>Imbues item with blazing fire, adding 5-10 fire damage to attacks and resistance by 4. Fire resistance is limited to covered body part(s). Stackable.</color>

Abilities:
<color_cyan>Dragon's Bane</color>:
<color_white>Attacking rolls a 1/3 chance. If successful, this weapon deals 45-60 cutting damage to dragon-type monsters.</color>

A huge two-handed broadsword made of dragon scales. It may look dull, but its blade can easily pierce through dragons.

Rune Slot: elemental rune (<color_blue>ice</color>)
<color_cyan>Runic Frost</color>:
<color_white>Imbues item with frost, adding 5-10 cold damage to attacks and resistance by 4. Cold resistance is limited to covered body part(s). Stackable.</color>

Abilities:
<color_cyan>Dragon's Bane</color>:
<color_white>Attacking rolls a 1/3 chance. If successful, this weapon deals 45-60 cutting damage to dragon-type monsters.</color>

A huge two-handed broadsword made of dragon scales. It may look dull, but its blade can easily pierce through dragons.

Rune Slot: elemental rune (<color_light_blue>electric</color>)
<color_cyan>Runic Shock</color>:
<color_white>Imbues item with electricity, adding 5-10 electric damage to attacks and resistance by 4. Electric resistance is limited to covered body part(s). Stackable.</color>

Abilities:
<color_cyan>Dragon's Bane</color>:
<color_white>Attacking rolls a 1/3 chance. If successful, this weapon deals 45-60 cutting damage to dragon-type monsters.</color>

A huge two-handed broadsword made of dragon scales. It may look dull, but its blade can easily pierce through dragons.

Rune Slot: elemental rune (<color_light_green>acid</color>)
<color_cyan>Runic Corrosion</color>:
<color_white>Imbues item with corrosive substance, adding 5-10 acid damage to attacks and resistance by 4. Acid resistance is limited to covered body part(s). Stackable.</color>

Abilities:
<color_cyan>Dragon's Bane</color>:
<color_white>Attacking rolls a 1/3 chance. If successful, this weapon deals 45-60 cutting damage to dragon-type monsters.</color>

A huge two-handed broadsword made of dragon scales. It may look dull, but its blade can easily pierce through dragons.

Rune Slot: ability rune (<color_yellow>shockwave</color>)
<color_cyan>Runic Shockwave</color>:
<color_white>Attacking rolls a 1/5 chance. If successful, leaves a transient shockwave that affects target(s) differently based on weapon type.
* <color_light_blue>Edged</color> - releases sonic wave in an arc, dealing 7-14 cutting damage to enemy targets.</color>

Abilities:
<color_cyan>Dragon's Bane</color>:
<color_white>Attacking rolls a 1/3 chance. If successful, this weapon deals 45-60 cutting damage to dragon-type monsters.</color>

A huge two-handed broadsword made of dragon scales. It may look dull, but its blade can easily pierce through dragons.

Rune Slot: ability rune (<color_magenta>feeble</color>)
<color_cyan>Runic Enfeeble</color>:
<color_white>Attacking rolls a 1/2 chance. If successful, weakens the target, decreasing their physical damage by 2 and strength by 1. Effect stacks up to 5 times.</color>

Abilities:
<color_cyan>Dragon's Bane</color>:
<color_white>Attacking rolls a 1/3 chance. If successful, this weapon deals 45-60 cutting damage to dragon-type monsters.</color>

A huge two-handed broadsword made of dragon scales. It may look dull, but its blade can easily pierce through dragons.

Rune Slot: ability rune (<color_light_red>empower</color>)
<color_cyan>Runic Empowering</color>:
<color_white>Attacking rolls a 1/2 chance. If successful, increases your raw power, providing 1 strength. Effect stacks up to 5 times.</color>

Abilities:
<color_cyan>Dragon's Bane</color>:
<color_white>Attacking rolls a 1/3 chance. If successful, this weapon deals 45-60 cutting damage to dragon-type monsters.</color>

A huge two-handed broadsword made of dragon scales. It may look dull, but its blade can easily pierce through dragons.

Rune Slot: ability rune (<color_cyan>arcane binding</color>)
<color_cyan>Runic Arcane Binding</color>:
<color_white>Attacking rolls a 1/5 chance. If successful, magically binds the target, halting their actions for 1-2 turns.</color>

Abilities:
<color_cyan>Dragon's Bane</color>:
<color_white>Attacking rolls a 1/3 chance. If successful, this weapon deals 45-60 cutting damage to dragon-type monsters.</color>

A huge two-handed broadsword made of dragon scales. It may look dull, but its blade can easily pierce through dragons.

Rune Slot: ability rune (<color_yellow>chronostasis</color>)
<color_cyan>Runic Chronostasis</color>:
<color_white>Attacking rolls a 1/15 chance. If successful, doubles your speed and dexterity, as well as giving 3 bonus dodges for a short period of time. While this takes effect, further strikes may negate their attack cost, which results for another free action.</color>

Abilities:
<color_cyan>Dragon's Bane</color>:
<color_white>Attacking rolls a 1/3 chance. If successful, this weapon deals 45-60 cutting damage to dragon-type monsters.</color>

A huge two-handed broadsword made of dragon scales. It may look dull, but its blade can easily pierce through dragons.

Rune Slot: ability rune (<color_dark_gray>ethereal phase</color>)
<color_cyan>Runic Ethereal Phase</color>:
<color_white>Attacking rolls a 1/25 chance. If successful, grants massive amount of speed, bonus dodges and invulnerability to physical damage for 3-7 turns. While this takes effect, your basic attacks passes through targets, which lets you swap positions with them, but won't do any harm.</color>

Abilities:
<color_cyan>Dragon's Bane</color>:
<color_white>Attacking rolls a 1/3 chance. If successful, this weapon deals 45-60 cutting damage to dragon-type monsters.</color>
